author: Bill Mahoney
title: Andrew Cuomo, social media superstar
description: The New York governor has long been one of the country’s most reviled politicians.
content:
Gov. Andrew Cuomo | Courtesy of the governor's office
ALBANY A month ago, in quieter times, Gov. Andrew Cuomo posted a story on Facebook about how scientists at a state college had found a tortoise on the Galapagos Islands previously believed to be extinct. … [+7778 chars]
